sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F ( BLD_DT , FLAW_END_DT , BASE_FMT , STRCT_FMT , AR , ARCH_AR , PLOT_AR , MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS , PRK_AR , ISD_PRK_AR , OSD_PRK_AR , PRK_CNT , ISD_PRK_CNT , OSD_PRK_CNT , EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC , VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD , WRT_TANK_LOC , SBT_LOC , OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC , SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC , LIFT_CNT_PSNGR , LIFT_CNT_CARGO , LIFT_CNT_EMGCY , LIFT_OPER_MTHD , CLNG_ENNC , CLNG_SRC , HTNG_ENNC , HTNG_SRC , SPICTANK_FMT , ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA , FCG , ITR , CEIL , ROOF , ROOF_WTPRF , PLAN_CNST_NM , PLAN_EXC_CMPNY , PLAN_BEGIN_DT , PLAN_END_DT , CNSTRCT_CNST_NM , CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY , CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT , CNSTRCT_END_DT , RM , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , FCLTS_MNG_NO , LOC , ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD ) VALUES ( #bldDt# , #flawEndDt# , #baseFmt# , #strctFmt# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#ar#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#archAr#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#plotAr#, ',', '')) , #mainUsagePrpos# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkAr#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkAr#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkAr#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkCnt#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkCnt#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkCnt#, ',', '')) , #exhaustDuctEnnc# , #vntltnArcndtMthd# , #wrtTankLoc# , #sbtLoc# , #oilSavefcltyLoc# , #swgClupfcltyLoc# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntPsngr#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntCargo#, ',', '')) , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntEmgcy#, ',', '')) , #liftOperMthd# , #clngEnnc# , #clngSrc# , #htngEnnc# , #htngSrc# , #spictankFmt# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#elctyLeadInCapa#, ',', '')) , #fcg# , #itr# , #ceil# , #roof# , #roofWtprf# , #planCnstNm# , #planExcCmpny# , #planBeginDt# , #planEndDt# , #cnstrctCnstNm# , #cnstrctExcCmpny# , #cnstrctBeginDt# , #cnstrctEndDt# , #rm# , #regUsr# , #registDt# , #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# || #gisAssetsCd# || #gisAssetsSubCd# || #gisPrtFcltyCd# || #gisPrtFcltySeq# || #prtFcltySe# , #loc# , #archFcltsClCd# )
sqlMap.select:
/* egovframework.rte.ygpa.gam.fclty.service.GamFcltySpecMngDao_SQL_oracle.selectList */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD ||'-'|| F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_DISPLAY , GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ||'-'|| GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_DISPLAY , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT) , 'yyyy-mm-dd') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT) , 'yyyy-mm-dd') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , (SELECT ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = F.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD) PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , F.LAT , F.LNG , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_STR , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM , DECODE(F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD,'10','광양','11','여수','기타') PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , F.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER , F.INFO INFO , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , R.LOC , TO_CHAR(R.BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A ON F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F R ON F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = R.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND R.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'
ORDER BY F.GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ DESC )Z ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A ON F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F R ON F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = R.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND R.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT Z.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , REG_USR , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_DT , ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ )Z ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#

/* egovframework.rte.ygpa.gam.fclty.service.GamFcltySpecMngDao_SQL_oracle.select */ SELECT C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_STR , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , C.GIS_ASSETS_CD , C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , P.GIS_ASSETS_NM , P.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , P.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , P.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , C.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , C.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM058', C.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , C.PRT_FCLTY_NM , C.FCLTS_MNG_NO , C.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = C.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , TO_CHAR(S.BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT , TO_CHAR(S.FLAW_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FLAW_END_DT , S.BASE_FMT , S.STRCT_FMT , S.AR , S.ARCH_AR , S.PLOT_AR , S.MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS , S.PRK_AR , S.ISD_PRK_AR , S.OSD_PRK_AR , S.PRK_CNT , S.ISD_PRK_CNT , S.OSD_PRK_CNT , S.EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC , S.VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD , S.WRT_TANK_LOC , S.SBT_LOC , S.OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC , S.SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC , S.LIFT_CNT_PSNGR , S.LIFT_CNT_CARGO , S.LIFT_CNT_EMGCY , S.LIFT_OPER_MTHD , S.CLNG_ENNC , S.CLNG_SRC , S.HTNG_ENNC , S.HTNG_SRC , S.SPICTANK_FMT , S.ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA , S.FCG , S.ITR , S.CEIL , S.ROOF , S.ROOF_WTPRF , S.PLAN_CNST_NM , S.PLAN_EXC_CMPNY , TO_CHAR(S.PLAN_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(S.PLAN_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_END_DT , S.CNSTRCT_CNST_NM , S.CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY , TO_CHAR(S.CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT , TO_CHAR(S.CNSTRCT_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNSTRCT_END_DT , S.RM , S.REG_USR , TO_CHAR(S.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGIST_DT , S.UPD_USR , S.UPDT_DT , S.FCLTS_MNG_NO , S.LOC , S.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = S.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD) ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F C LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F P ON P.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND P.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND P.GIS_ASSETS_CD = C.GIS_ASSETS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F S ON C.FCLTS_MNG_NO = S.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1 AND C.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#

SELECT BLD_DT , FLAW_END_DT , BASE_FMT , STRCT_FMT , AR , ARCH_AR , PLOT_AR , MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS , PRK_AR , ISD_PRK_AR , OSD_PRK_AR , PRK_CNT , ISD_PRK_CNT , OSD_PRK_CNT , EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC , VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD , WRT_TANK_LOC , SBT_LOC , OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC , SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC , LIFT_CNT_PSNGR , LIFT_CNT_CARGO , LIFT_CNT_EMGCY , LIFT_OPER_MTHD , CLNG_ENNC , CLNG_SRC , HTNG_ENNC , HTNG_SRC , SPICTANK_FMT , ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA , FCG , ITR , CEIL , ROOF , ROOF_WTPRF , PLAN_CNST_NM , PLAN_EXC_CMPNY , PLAN_BEGIN_DT , PLAN_END_DT , CNSTRCT_CNST_NM , CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY , CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT , CNSTRCT_END_DT , RM , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , UPD_USR , UPDT_DT , FCLTS_MNG_NO , LOC , ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD FROM ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1,'2','0') FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
INSERT INTO FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , REG_USR , REGIST_DT , ATCH_FILE_SE , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngNo# , #maxFcltyFileSeq# , #atchFileSj# , #atchFileNmLogic# , #atchFileNmPhysicl# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE , #atchFileSe# , #atchFileWritngDt# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F SET BLD_DT = #bldDt# ,FLAW_END_DT = #flawEndDt# ,BASE_FMT = #baseFmt# ,STRCT_FMT = #strctFmt# ,AR = TO_NUMBER(#ar#) ,ARCH_AR = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#archAr#, ',', '')) ,PLOT_AR = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#plotAr#, ',', '')) ,MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS = #mainUsagePrpos# ,PRK_AR = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkAr#, ',', '')) ,ISD_PRK_AR = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkAr#, ',', '')) ,OSD_PRK_AR = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkAr#, ',', '')) ,PRK_CNT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkCnt#, ',', '')) ,ISD_PRK_CNT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkCnt#, ',', '')) ,OSD_PRK_CNT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkCnt#, ',', '')) ,EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC = #exhaustDuctEnnc# ,VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD = #vntltnArcndtMthd# ,WRT_TANK_LOC = #wrtTankLoc# ,SBT_LOC = #sbtLoc# ,OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC = #oilSavefcltyLoc# ,SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC = #swgClupfcltyLoc# ,LIFT_CNT_PSNGR = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntPsngr#, ',', '')) ,LIFT_CNT_CARGO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntCargo#, ',', '')) ,LIFT_CNT_EMGCY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntEmgcy#, ',', '')) ,LIFT_OPER_MTHD = #liftOperMthd# ,CLNG_ENNC = #clngEnnc# ,CLNG_SRC = #clngSrc# ,HTNG_ENNC = #htngEnnc# ,HTNG_SRC = #htngSrc# ,SPICTANK_FMT = #spictankFmt# ,ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#elctyLeadInCapa#, ',', '')) ,FCG = #fcg# ,ITR = #itr# ,CEIL = #ceil# ,ROOF = #roof# ,ROOF_WTPRF = #roofWtprf# ,PLAN_CNST_NM = #planCnstNm# ,PLAN_EXC_CMPNY = #planExcCmpny# ,PLAN_BEGIN_DT = #planBeginDt# ,PLAN_END_DT = #planEndDt# ,CNSTRCT_CNST_NM = #cnstrctCnstNm# ,CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY = #cnstrctExcCmpny# ,CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT = #cnstrctBeginDt# ,CNSTRCT_END_DT = #cnstrctEndDt# ,RM = #rm# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,LOC = #loc# ,ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD = #archFcltsClCd#
WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = #atchFileSeq#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_SJ = #atchFileSj# , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT = #atchFileWritngDt#
WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = #atchFileSeq#
